title: Coop Vs AI Is infested with LVL Bots.
body:
Just because i am playing AGAINST bots, does not mean i want the scum on my team.

It's only a matter of time before they start showing up in EVERY pvp match, Get rid of them early and save this damn game.

They are mostly owned by chinese goldfarming sites, one google search and you can find hundreds of websites that riot could be sueing and making $$$ off instead of waiting for players to buy the accounts and purchase RP.

Forget about client updates and skins, fix the current problems with the game first.

replies.body: they've already infected aram late at night

Leveling in this game is... A waste of time.
You level vsing bots with bots.

I cannot help but think it is riot doing it so you can get a faster game. O SAP I just worked it out it is a  **Conspiracy theory** and **RIOT** is the head of the illuminati and I am going to die tonight because I pointed it out.

SPREAD THE WORD PEOPLE. Do not let my death be in vain!!!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
